text: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] The Runner must pay 2[credit] or trash 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] The Runner must pay 2[credit] or trash 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage.
title: Fairchild 2.0
